name: Mind The Gap!
description:
*Better in Fullscreen

How to play:

  • Click the deliverer to set him to embark a metro or the next metro;
  • Click or the embarked metro (orange) to disembark;
  • Collect the lost regalia and deliver it back to its owner, each deliver rewards you with time and money;
  • Dont let the time of the deliveries run out or you will lose time;
  • When your time runs out its game over.

Explore a heavily stylized game, based on 1960`s Jazz culture, and unveil the atmospheric soundstrack.

Unlock new cities, each one with its own transportation challenges.

Made for the GlobalGame Jam 2021
